parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the co-streaming application. You can create or query co-streaming applications in the ApsaraVideo Live console.

parameters.name: CustomSei
parameters.description: The custom SEI. The value is a JSON string and can be up to 4 KB in size.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the task. You can specify only one task ID. Format: AL-MD5("rtmp://{Domain}/live/{AppId}\_{ChannelId}\_{UserId}\_camera").
